post_title: Cobb Bat Off Shoulder Polar Bear SGC 1.5
post_content:
All prices include shipping and insurance (within the US) and assume a no-fee payment method.  If you'd like to use Paypal Goods and Services, that's fine, just add 3.5%.  I have to collect sales tax from Washington state buyers.

Pieces of scrap tobacco big enough you could smoke them on this card.  Cool feature for some, probably not so much for others.

$3150

scrap tobacco? I've never seen that. T206 is not the world I live in though.

Sent from my SM-G9900 using Tapatalk
